attributes.action: allow parents the right to choose if their child starts school the term after they are 4 years old or the term after they are  5 years old and not to miss out on reception year as a result.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reports state that some children who start school just after their 4th birthday may struggle due to their young age.A stimulating home environment can be more beneficial than starting school at just 4.Current law states thay must attend school the term after they are 4 - whenever their birthday falls in the year.If held back they forgo 'reception year' - a fundamental stage in school transition. Allow parents the right to decide if their child spends another year at home without it jepordising their education.

rejection.details:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/toyoungforschool/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
